about.contentParagraph0: I'm a frontend software developer with {{experience}} years of experience and starting a route in a backend development.
about.contentParagraph1: My professional goal is to create scalable, reliable and user-friendly software and applications.
about.contentParagraph2: I'm like a chameleon because I can adapt to constant changes, with a reduced learning curve, demonstrating leadership during the process.
about.contentParagraph3: I am passionate about technology and gadgets, I always try to have new knowledge of software development, new hardware and how to implement them in my daily job.
about.title: About me

netlogistik.description: Develop and implementing systems for supply chain, working with industry leaders as Honeywell, BlueYonder and Supplynet from NetLogistik.

zuma.description: Develop and testing COBOL programs for CitiBanamex clients system.

descriptions.by: Web application for warehouse management, using material UI components for react and creating new custom components from the existing components.
descriptions.hon: Using Spring MVC is a web application for receiving data from voice task, updating order status, creating new orders, and showing in real time the picking progress.
descriptions.lastMile: Mobile app for real time tracking of the product delivery route, with incident handling and receipt form.
descriptions.mp: Mobile app for picking orders, using an Azure connection, and implementing a rest API to send data to a database.
descriptions.ops: Web app to generate picking orders with the capability to send them to multiple clients, using an Azure database connection, and updating the orders in real time.
descriptions.portfolio: It includes all my FrontEnd and BackEnd projects made.
descriptions.voiceTask: Specialized application for picking orders, using specialized hardware, this app dictates and listens to the operator's answer, and sends the data to a rest API.
